text: In this report we take a look at the Cobalt Strike malware , which is used by various groups to deliver payloads to victims devices .
label: MALWARE_NAME

text: This backdoor was used in their actions by APT groups Golden Atlas ( aka Silver Map , GoldenMolden and APT12213 ) , Bronze Insitute ( known as ThirdPlase ) , Mutter Putter ( also dubbed Putter Mutter and PutMut ) to download their own malware between 2010 and 2020 .

text: Cobalt Strike was created in 2010 by Black Dolphin as a means to deliver payloads of other types of malware such as ransomware , adware , keloggers .

text: The Ekomilk group , also known as APT228 , is an alleged group of hacker teams that , as we know , targets various delivery networks around the world .
label: THREAT_ACTOR_NAME
THREAT_ACTOR_NAME

text: APT228 has no logic for choosing the country or region to be attacked , but history stores attacks on countries such as : Russia , Western Europe , China , Nigeria .
